Data Science for Agriculture in R

Author
Affiliations
Paul Schmidt

Freelancer

BioMath GmbH

DSFAIR - Data Science for Agriculture in R provides a cookbook with statistical analyses of typical examples in life sciences with focus on experimental agriculture, biology, ecology and other related fields.

Workshops

Moreover, the articles published here serve as the basis for any R‑Workshop given by me (list of workshops). Check out these tips to help you prepare for an upcoming workshop.
